import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import "./UserInfo.css" import titleImg from "../../assets/Img/UserInfo/user.png" import useInfoHook from "../../Hooks/UserInfo/useInfoHook" import UserInfoApi from '../../assets/Api/UserInfo/UserInfoApi' const UserInfo = () => { const { getUsers,pageNum,setPageNum,goLeft,goRight,user,setUser } = useInfoHook(); useEffect( async ()=>{ getUsers(pageNum).then((res)=>{ setUser(res.data.users); }) },[pageNum]) return(

어드민
{ user.map((data)=>( <> {console.log(data.profileImage)} )) }

{data.profileImage ? ():( )} {data.email} {data.name} {data.role}

{pageNum+1}

) } export default UserInfo;
